name: Aliens Use Digging Machine
description:
An astronaut looking for survivors,  they were killed by a cursed machine, machine created to kill. You may not find anyone alive because the aliens use a digging machine.

Controls:

  
   Left         Right                   Jump

   Enter skip dialogs

You can use a joystick

Features:

  • Short adventure.
  • Two level plus a final boss very hard.
  • Lots of diamonds just to boost your ego.
  • Scary sounds.
  • A simple platform with a simple story.

Developed while learning to develop.
